plot: Addicted and alone, but for her co-dependent boyfriend, Lana is a shadow of her former self. Arriving at a new low, she confronts her past, but will Lana find the strength to move forward?
title: Lana
plot_es: Addicted and alone, but for her co-dependent boyfriend, Lana is a shadow of her former self. Arriving at a new low, she confronts her past, but will Lana find the strength to move forward?
plot_en: Addicted and alone, but for her co-dependent boyfriend, Lana is a shadow of her former self. Arriving at a new low, she confronts her past, but will Lana find the strength to move forward?
